# Cargo SOP
- [textlink="Quartermaster" link="QMSOP"] - [textlink="Cargo Technician" link="CargoTechnicianSOP"] - [textlink="Salvage" link="SalvageSOP"]
[color=#999999][italic]"Salvage Specialists are [bolditalic]not[/bolditalic] permitted to throw people into manufactured wormholes, nor are they permitted to trick people into using Bluespace Crystals, or throwing Bluespace Crystals at anyone;"[/italic] - Salvage Technician SOP {2}[/color]
